action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble
trait.text: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each ofits turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

action.name: Bladed Chain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Spew Flame (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Nimble
trait.text: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each ofits turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

action.name: Barbed Pole
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Trostani

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Trostani's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 24). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dispel magic, druidcraft
3/day each: bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion
1/day each: conjure fey, mass cure wounds

monster.spells: Dispel Magic, Druidcraft, Bless, Conjure Animals, Giant Insect, Moonbeam, Plant Growth, Spike Growth, Suggestion, Conjure Fey, Mass Cure Wounds

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
trait.text: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
trait.text: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

action.name: Touch of Order
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +16 to hit. reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start ofTrostani's next turn.

action.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Voice of Harmony
legendary.text: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Voice of Life
legendary.text: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary.name: Voice of Order
legendary.text: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

monster.name: Horncaller

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The horncaller's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14). The horncaller can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: bless, conjure animals

trait.name: Speak with Beasts
trait.text: The horncaller can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: One with the Worldsoul
action.text: The horncaller chooses one beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the beast can hear the horncaller, the beast uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the horncaller can see.

monster.resist: cold, poison

trait.text: Zegana can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Zegana is a 15th-level Simic spellcaster. Her spellÂ· casting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, druidcraft, ray of frost, shape water
1st level (4 slots): color spray, expeditious retreat, fog cloud, shield
2nd level (3 slots): enlarge/reduce, gust of wind
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, slow
4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, creation
6th level (1 slot): move earth, wall ofice
7th level (1 slot): prismatic spray, teleport

action.name: Prime Speaker's Trident.
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 (3d8). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: Deluge (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

legendary.name: Adaptive Skin
legendary.text: Zegana gains resistance to one damage type of her choice-acid, fire, lightning, or thunder-until the start of her next turn

legendary.name: Trident
legendary.text: Zegana makes one melee attack with the Prime Speaker's Trident.

legendary.name: Enlarge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Zegana casts enlarge/reduce on herself, using the enlarge option, without expending a spell slot.

legendary.name: Deluge (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Zegana uses Deluge, if available.

monster.name: Biomancer

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
trait.text: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield
2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy
4th level (3 slots): confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster
6th level (1 slot): move earth, wall ofice
7th level (1 slot): prismatic spray
8th level (1 slot): control weather

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
